about.name: Rajpreet Singh Nayyar
about.title: Software Engineer III | C# .NET Core • Microservices • Distributed Systems
about.bio: I design and build backend systems using microservice architecture, strong system design principles, and domain-driven design. My work focuses on creating well-bounded services, clean APIs, and scalable cloud-ready systems that are resilient, observable, and easy to evolve. I care deeply about clean code, pragmatic abstractions, and engineering solutions that hold up as products and teams grow.

timeline.description: Focused on building resilient, observable, cloud-friendly backend services in .NET with strong quality and performance.
achievements: Designed and shipped resilient .NET services with strong observability (logs, metrics, tracing).
Reduced latency and improved throughput by optimizing critical paths and database access patterns.
Led technical design reviews, improved code quality, and mentored peers on clean code practices.

timeline.description: Built API platforms and background pipelines for high-volume workloads, improving reliability and release velocity.
achievements: Built REST APIs and background processing pipelines for high-volume workloads.
Improved reliability with idempotency, retries, and better error handling across integrations.
Collaborated closely with product and QA to deliver features in fast cycles.

timeline.description: Worked across UI and services, emphasizing maintainability, testability, and automation to speed delivery.
achievements: Developed features across UI and services, focusing on maintainable, testable code.
Implemented CI/CD improvements to reduce release friction and speed up delivery.
Created internal tooling to streamline developer workflows.

items.title: Virtual Traveler Map
items.description: An interactive map where users enter destination + dates and get personalized hotel/resort/activity recommendations.

items.title: Invisible Wallet
items.description: A concept extension that recommends the best card based on merchant category and rewards.

items.title: Meeting Whisperer
items.description: A prototype to extract structured notes and action items from meeting transcripts with a clean UI.

items.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect — Associate
items.description: Core AWS architecture, security, networking, and cost-optimized design.
